channel.title: Npc direction
channel.description: How can I change the way the Npc's are looking? I'm filling a bank and I want the bankers to face east but their facing south.

item.title: Npc direction
item.dc:creator: @sp11k3t3ht3rd sp11k3t3ht3rd
item.description:
@sp11k3t3ht3rd wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:11, topic:342059”]NOOOOOO
THE LAST ONE MAKES THE NPC WALKABLE OR NOT

1 = does not walk 2 = walks[/quote]
Okay, but after I changed those around I put them all back to 1. I still can’t be near the npc’s or I get disconnected.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc direction
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

NOOOOOO
THE LAST ONE MAKES THE NPC WALKABLE OR NOT

1 = does not walk 2 = walks

item.title: Npc direction
item.dc:creator: @sp11k3t3ht3rd sp11k3t3ht3rd
item.description:
@sp11k3t3ht3rd wrote:

So does anyone know what happened that caused that error?

item.title: Npc direction
item.dc:creator: @_Dj_Bigdadd `Dj_Bigdadd`
item.description:
@_Dj_Bigdadd wrote:

[quote=“iamapker, post:4, topic:342059”][quote author=wohuynia link=topic=438470.msg3222570#msg3222570 date=1275285353]

spawn = 2263	3017	4824	0	3021	4828	2975	4820	1

adjust 0, as i remember that’s the angle which npc is facing.
[/quote]
im sorry i tryed this and it wrong… the npcs are standing in the same direction…

its the “1” at the very end change that between 0-4 i dont really know which number goes to what direction just test them[/quote]

this dont work ive tryed and read at the top of the autospawn.cfg file

[quote=“sp11k3t3ht3rd, post:3, topic:342059”]I thought that fourth number was height. This is the top of my autospawn.cfg:

//----------NpcID-------CoordX----CoordY----Height-----RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Description

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Npc direction
item.dc:creator: @sp11k3t3ht3rd sp11k3t3ht3rd
item.description:
@sp11k3t3ht3rd wrote:

Well I changed it but when I logged in when I was near the bankers it would kick me of. I would login for like 1 or 2 seconds and then be disconnected. When I deleted my autospawn.cfg it fixed me getting kicked, but when I put the spawns back in it still kicks me. Any idea as to whats happening?

Read full topic
